data.text:
@PeterHotez @babydocAnita @JHUPress Just released with redactions:
CUMULATIVE ANALYSIS OF POST-AUTHORIZATION ADVERSE EVENT REPORTS OF PF-07302048 (BNT162B2) RECEIVED THROUGH 28-FEB-2021 Last 8 pages starting on page 30 are side effects $PFE knew of. Guarantee no pro-vax doc has seen this:  https://t.co/90ZTYGq1xt
@PeterHotez @JHUPress You should work on early treatments for Covid so when the next “variant” comes you can help sick folks. Vax don’t work doc.

@springbokVXOne @AreYouAlpha1 @PeterHotez @JHUPress Wait 3 to 5 years when insurance companies will stop paying death benefits for people who vaccinated and died as a result of adverse reactions. It is already happening around the world.
@LachlanBouchard @PeterHotez @JHUPress Sheesh…2 years into the pandemic and we still have to deal with low IQ idiots like you who lack even a basic education on science https://t.co/x3VLtkNk6b

@AreYouAlpha1 @PeterHotez @JHUPress Look…I don’t mean to be rude…but in all honesty…you’re an unfettered moron..mRNA vaccines are not experimental…they went through extensive trials..and after two years and 9 billion plus shots..they’re the most widely tested vaccines ever…safe and effective in every respect https://t.co/Zqijfcm9E3
@PeterHotez @JHUPress Anti science: euphemism for scientists with a different opinion from mine.
@MarkShostrom @PeterHotez @JHUPress Thank you! As soon as I get a break to write it! https://t.co/moHGn6hDCn
@PeterHotez @JHUPress Really looking forward to reading your book!
@PeterHotez @JHUPress What do you mean by "and more" Doc? Like, other than COVID?
